H0.text: Energy refers to the ability to change or move matter and is required by all life processes and living things.

H1.text: Fuel refers to the ability to change or move matter and is required by all life processes and living things.

H2.text: Gravity refers to the ability to change or move matter and is required by all life processes and living things.

H3.text: Enthalpy is the ability to change or move matter and is required by all life processes and living things.

A4.text: All living organisms constantly take in and release energy.

A5.text: All living creatures rely on an external source of energy to be able to grow and reproduce â€“ radiant energy from the Sun in the case of green plants and chemical energy (in some form) in the case of animals.
